text: Donald Ernest "Don" Johns (December 13, 1937 - July 8, 2017) was a Canadian professional ice hockey defenceman. He played 153 games in the National Hockey League for the Montreal Canadiens, New York Rangers, and Minnesota North Stars. He was born in St. George, Ontario. Johns died on July 8, 2017 in Pointe-Claire, Quebec from a heart attack, aged 79. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Baltimore Clippers players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Minnesota North Stars players Category:Quebec Aces players Category:Rochester Americans players Category:Sportspeople from Ontario Category:Springfield Indians players
title: Don Johns
